ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50; Species: Oncorhynchus mykiss (Rainbow trout,Donaldson trout); Conditions: fresh water, temperature 12 to 13 °C, pH 6.9 to 7.8, hardness 92 to 110 mg/L CaCO3, dissolved oxygen 9.3 to 10.1 mg/L; renewal; Concentration: 9280 ug/L (95% confidence limit: 6680 to 12300ug/L) for 28 days /total/
